title: Product
description: XDM product, product variant and key attributes of product in the product catalog.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: The internal unique ID of the product or variant in the commerce backend system.

xdm:SKU.title: SKU
xdm:SKU.description: The unique SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) of the variant assigned by the vendor.

schema:description.title: Description
schema:description.description: The localized description of the product.

xdm:categories.title: Category
xdm:categories.description: List of category ids of the product.

xdm:masterProductID.title: Master Product Identifier
xdm:masterProductID.description: The internal unique ID of the product in the commerce backend system.

xdm:prices.title: Prices
xdm:prices.description: The list of prices for this product.

xdm:assets.title: Assets
xdm:assets.description: List of assets associated with this product.

xdm:attributes.title: Attributes
xdm:attributes.description: List of attributes associated with this product.

xdm:variants.title: Product Variants
xdm:variants.description: List of product variations belonging to this product.

xdm:productURL.title: Product URL
xdm:productURL.description: The URL for the primary Product View of the product page.
